channel.title: I really need some serious help
channel.description:
1st of all i cant compile any scripts i dl (yes i do name them .JAVA files, and yes i do click the compile scripts button but i get "javac is not excutable internal or external whatever............." i dont know why that happens. Next i dont know how to actually run any freakin script, i just press run.....and all i get is rune commmand something........WTF?.........Next if i do get the script running are there any colors or any info that i need to input when i wasn to get it running? I would really be nice if someone could just answer these simple things for me, because as you can see im totally lost and i cant find a tutorial or anything on how to even start using the scripts.......
1 more thing........what in the blue hell is a deob?

item.title: I really need some serious help
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Download JDK and JRE, they can be found eaily on google or suns website.

You’ll most likely have to set some things, so do this:

Right click my computer, go to the advanced tab, click on the envirnment values(or something like that), double click on “path” and add a semicolon to it. After the semicolon, add the location to your jdk bin folder, which should be: C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin

Read full topic
